alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:57AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Robeson, northwestern Bladen, Florence, Dillon, eastern Darlington, northern Marion, eastern Marlboro and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 745 AM EST... At 655 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Laurinburg to near Dunbar to near Mechanicsville to near Timmonsville to near Millwood. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lumberton, Bennettsville, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Darlington, Mullins, Red Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Maxton, Timmonsville, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Latta, Pamplico, Rowland, Lamar and Quinby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 130 and 141. Interstate 95 IN South Carolina near mile marker 146, and between mile markers 148 and 198. Interstate 95 IN North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Williamsburg
